segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the girl waiting patiently for her cookie, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of the children's actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the water is spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit amused by how focused the children are on getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's determination is quite impressive, even if it's a bit risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to trust that her brother will share the cookies with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the garden outside looks very well-maintained and peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should turn off the faucet before the kitchen gets flooded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is quite interesting, with so much happening at once.
segments.speaker: PAR
